website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice if you are focusing on bloom quality and prefer an organic formula; otherwise it's not practical or affordable for most gardening needs.
pros: Organic and easy to use – capable of producing vibrant colors and enhanced bloom aromas
Ideal for blooming plants and flowering trees
We love that it is odor-free
cons: It's pricey, and doesn't produce noticeable results in all plants, including some types of vegetables

customer_reviews.title: I use it for my weed and it grew like a weed
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my weed and it grew like a weed. Very good and I recommend it to everyone. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Revived My Plants! !!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked for me. My potted petunias were almost completely dead to the roots. I got this product on Friday and mixed some in an empty milk jug and watered my plants. I watered again Saturday night before going out of town for the 4th of July. I returned home today and was totally amazed to see that Less than a week later my plants have revived and have blooms!!!! Equally as surprised regarding the new blooms because they had not been watered for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bull

customer_reviews.title: Glad it's organic
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy to find something that is organic. I'm not big on watering my girls a bunch of chemicals just to make them a little bigger, then go and make something and call it medicine. I will continue to use this product, I haven't had a problem with it burning the plants or any other issues. I use it everyday but only half the amount that is called for.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Grow Big Buds
customer_reviews.text: I swear by it. For big buds, this is the feed to use.
customer_reviews.author: Diablita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent liquid fertilizer; it works on potted plants
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. This liquid fertilizer is gentle to my potted plant. It took about a month for the plant to show new vigorous growth. The new look of my plant makes me happy. Instruction says to use it every time you water the plant; but who would trouble themselves to do that? I only used once about two months ago to see the effect of the fertilizer. I am sold on "organics" products, which seem to deliver something good whether on face lotions or fertilizers; and this is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: A hiker

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fertilizer. No scent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fertilizer. No scent and easy to use. Not at all messy. And loads of flowers from it. Don't use on marigolds, though. You will end up with alotta green and no orange. I had to stop using it on them. But, that is not the fertilizer's fault. It's my fault for not understanding what the marigolds needed and didn't need.
customer_reviews.author: Isadora Cocoa

customer_reviews.title: Great STuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My plants got big and produced large "fruit"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mix stuff. I found it hard to buy liquid and not a lot. I just have a patio garden. had trouble with a fuschia and some yellow leaves, and a centauri flowering plant not blooming as much as normal. Got the bottle and put measured amount in watering can. by the next day I had visibly better fuschia, and by 2 days the centauri had bloom buds all over. I also used it on my potted herbs of basil, oregano, parsley, and chives, and they too are happy plants. it doesn't take much to a gallon, and so well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Richardson

customer_reviews.title: True to Its Name
customer_reviews.text: My veggie garden seemed healthy but was barely growing. A little bit of the 'grow big' and then 'big Bloom' from Fox Farm (along with more sun!) made a HUGE difference. Happy plants!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Grace

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: I use miracle grow soil for my vegetable plants, and I grow a lot of tomatoes. I get a good yeild from them but it takes time. I get a lot of flowers but no fruit for a while normally. I got this product and put it on the plants and had fruit in 2 days. I did have a small problem when it was shipped but that was corrected really quick. If you're growing a garden and want it to produce fast you really should get this product, it really works great. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MadMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have been using the Fox Farm line for a while and am very pleased. I would recommend following the instructions. By overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Although I advise measuring properly, and carefully. I didn't do that the first time I used it, I thought that the dispenser wasn't working properly so I upped the quantity of concentrate coming out and then thought I nearly killed my flower beds by using too much (I overdid it and had a lot of leaf die off in early spring). Now? I have amazing, lush flower beds that are overflowing. It's quite spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Fox Farm is the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been able to grow some amazing plants using Fox Farm can't say enough good about them there organic clean very good shelf life on their products put together well just be very careful when you buy it there will be some tape around the cap the reason why is because there is a small vent hole and the top of the cap, which you can use like a squeeze bottle... just make sure that you have a way to cover that hole if not you will spill it out everywhere
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuyFromFl

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Fox Farms Big Bloom fertilizer made my plants grow so fast! They also seem stronger & firmer than they were before. I got this in the mail on 02/16/17 and after a month and a half (04/06/17), the higher rate of growth in my plants is noticeable. I included some before and after pictures so y'all can see the difference in such a short time Plants I used this on: Monstera Deliciosa (Swiss Cheese Plant) - first picture Ficus Elastica (Rubber Plant) - second picture Cyclamen Peesicum - third picture Callisia Tri-Color Bolivian (Wandering Jew) - fourth picture Maranta Leuconeura (Prayer Plant) - fifth picture
customer_reviews.author: Bah

customer_reviews.title: It gave my plants nute burn. :(
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this product less and less, but each time my plants did not respond to it well. Each time they got Nute burn. I started crying today when I saw my plants leaves. I have had these plants since they were little seeds. Their harvest date is coming up August 25th. They've been happy plants until I started using Big Bloom. I won't ever use this product ever again. It just brakes my heart. Its like I am their plant Mom and I gave them something that burnt their little leaves. It's just awful. I am beyond devastated right now. My plants were doing better from cheaper products than this. Please be careful using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Jah man!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a believer in Fox Farms products after this year with bigger yields than ever before, though some good old fashioned molasses while blooming is also good, especially if you are tapering off on any type of chemicals before harvest. Not all natural but darn close.
customer_reviews.author: Lomatium

customer_reviews.title: Dont purchase from this seller
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is a good product, unfortunately not the seller. Just like some of the other reviews, the seal on the bottle had a perfect circular puncture almost as if someone was trying to empty/dilute the product. If that's not the case it still doesnt matter because it leaked all inside the packaging anyways.
customer_reviews.author: charlene matos

customer_reviews.title: Here it is
customer_reviews.text: Stop second guessing yourself and go with Fox Farms, you won't be disappointed. Although, you should follow the directions that they provide for you on the bottle. Don't overfeed your plants. They don't like that.
customer_reviews.author: JJnGG

customer_reviews.title: Quick result
customer_reviews.text: My pomergranant tree drop buds and has no fruit by end of June for 2years. I add this and see quick result. It not only continued blooming, it has lots of fruit. It’s organic fertilizer, it won’t ruin the soil. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tangoleash

customer_reviews.title: Blooms Galore !
customer_reviews.text: Blooms Galore ! No odor and easy to use. I mix it up with water in an empty wine bottle ... One possible caution. The plants can become exhausted if coaxed to bloom over and over and over. I'm on my third round of blooms on the harvest-holiday flowering plants, and they are starting to look tired. ;(
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far so good ! Had to transplant my 2 cactus and Jade plant as well as my Bromeliad. No stress or problems at all ! Can't wait to get more bonsai trees, cactus , and other amazing household plants and see them flourish with this plant food.
customer_reviews.author: KRB61

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: My flowers just love this. All my flowers perk right up after using this. The next day, my flowers look even nicer. Very easy to use. No horrible smell, like with other fertilizers. Has not burned any plants. I use it on my roses, hibiscus, petunias and everything else in my yard. Love my Big Bloom.
customer_reviews.author: Luvmakeup1000

customer_reviews.title: Expired in 2017, lost in return to be told to do their job, don't buy from Amazon warehouse.
customer_reviews.text: Expired in 2017, would find another line of nutes-ff is living off it's name and hoping to off your ignorance and money. If you have to, don't get it from Amazon who stores stuff in problematic conditions longterm without any consideration so it blows up when you open it. Then it gets lost in return but Amazon doesn't care about that or my dying plants, so I've got to do their job and try to find it???
customer_reviews.author: BadN

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the fox farms trio and since big bloom is used throughout the grow it gets used up three times faster than the other nutrients. This will be the third bottle of big bloom in as many years and the next time I will be purchasing the trio again. I'm very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: All of our vegetables and herbs are growing like weeds. Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: A friend has been recommending this to me for years. I don't know why I waited so long. All of our vegetables and herbs are growing like weeds. Great stuff. Will buy again, and again, and again.
customer_reviews.author: YogaGirl42

customer_reviews.title: My plants were growing like Crazy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful organic fertilizer. I was looking for an organic fertilizer as I wanted to eliminate the nasty chemicals in my home; I also have pets and wanted to keep them away from the chemicals as well. I used this on my houseplants in the beginning of spring and was so pleasantly surprised to see how quickly I began to see new growth! I use once a month diluted with water.
customer_reviews.author: H. K.

customer_reviews.title: ROSES love it!
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Fox Farm Big Bloom. ROSES love it!!
customer_reviews.author: N.S. Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Although it is difficult to pour out small amounts, I found this fertilizer works very well on all my flowering plants, both in doors and out. I ended up using a dropper to measure small quantities for my watering can for my indoor plant which works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference
customer_reviews.text: I start using this every other week in my potted houseplants, and I see a huge difference. I began late spring, and almost everything got new growth, deeper greens, and even some bloomed that I never knew even would. Great stuff. I am on my third bottle.
customer_reviews.author: BreeTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: FOX FARM BIG BLOOM LIQUID CONCENTRATE
customer_reviews.text: Great for my buds, wish I had used it sooner and more often. Will be a regular purchase. I had a lot of foliage, no flowers. A month later, everything is blooming the flowers are huge. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phillyb5210

customer_reviews.title: Tampered product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have been tampered with. Might have been partially emptied and refilled with water or something else. There is a hole that is punched through the original cap and seal.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H

customer_reviews.title: Incredible blooms, and no bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never seen my plants produce so many blooms before. This proves to me that natural animal-based fertilizers are what plants really need. I just ordered two more. So easy to add to your watering can. And hardly any smell. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: generic

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fertilizer. No scent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fertilizer. No scent and easy to use. Not at all messy. And loads of flowers from it. Don't use on marigolds, though. You will end up with alotta green and no orange. I had to stop using it on them. But, that is not the fertilizer's fault. It's my fault for not understanding what the marigolds needed and didn't need.
customer_reviews.author: Baker bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my tomatoes at the base after watering the every third day and all the wilting and yellow leaves on the bottom stopped and the plant has exploded in growth the last couple days
customer_reviews.author: Seaba33

customer_reviews.title: Best product for transitional flowering.
customer_reviews.text: Scent category rating for this need not apply as it’s a fertilizer...a very effective solution for transitional flowering.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chick

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME FERTILIZER FOR ALL OF YOUR GARDEN
customer_reviews.text: Exelent Products, be careful cuz its extremely potent very srong stuff so use very little it will work Exelent an wont burn or kill your canna's also Exelent for tomatoes.Awsome Stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Bonziamaster

customer_reviews.title: It worked wonders on our plants
customer_reviews.text: We finally got flowers on our Plumerias, after 3 years and only 1 application of Fox Farms. It’s expensive, but all the plants did great using this. I will buy again. Had huge production on pepper plants as well.
customer_reviews.author: Blz2rvr

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, leaves are big with an abundance of flowers in the verbenas I bought. It helped the foxgloves perk up after I potted them.
customer_reviews.author: Itas

customer_reviews.title: Best fertilizer I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself and your plants a favor and buy this product. My plants absolutely thrive, love, and are growing like crazy! So easy to use, not smelly at all. I use this on my outdoor veggies and indoor babies. My whole plant family enjoy the benefits of this fertilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: You might have better luck
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that my blooms were bigger or my veggies grew any denser but it wasn't worse. All the measuring and mixing was a bit inconvenient but not difficult. I don't see the value in this product and would likely not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen lacy

customer_reviews.title: Most plants love this
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for many plants in the garden. They love this stuff. Yes it is good for your cannabis garden too. Recommend for beginners because its easy to use along with other fox farm nutrients. I started out growing with this and my plants were pretty damn good for a beginner self taught.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Used it and it works
customer_reviews.text: So far, the first time, used half of what was recommended. My little girl is feeling the fertilizer and getting more buds at more sites than I thought there would be.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: love it, it helped my plants tremendously and I'm going to keep buying. it came so quick too and all the stores were out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for years. I’ve used GH and other brands, but I always come back to FF fertilizers... they are simply amazing, pricey... but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ITGuy

customer_reviews.title: Big Bloom
customer_reviews.text: Once this was added to my plants they took off. The fox farm big bloom made a tremendous difference in my garden. I'd recommend this to organic growers.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Witvoet

customer_reviews.title: Really brings out the blooms!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, it really brings out the blooms! I bought a few plants at clearance prices that had been pretty neglected. This stuff really brought them back with amazing blooms!
customer_reviews.author: JDG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the broad variety of elements in Big Bloom. I do wish the NPK levels were a bit higher, but, my plants are happy, no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great fertilizer
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my mother in-laws roses life saver for me lol.Working on development of my green thumb and this is a great product.Thanks from a super novice grower.
customer_reviews.author: Michael p.

customer_reviews.title: My plants like it
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product since my plants seem very happy with it. I've purchased it 3 times and plan to do so again when I run out. This is great stuff!

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It was good when I bought 2 years ago but it look they changed the formula. It's doesn't work and it's pricey.

customer_reviews.title: Great fertilizer!
customer_reviews.text: My mangos and lemons I started from seed stopped growing new leaves . Two days after giving this to them they started growing. This is great 👍 fertilizer .

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my tomato plants and was quite happy I had. They grew much faster after use. My thanks to the manufacturer/ the seller & Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite plant foods. Weird brown color but it makes my plants have new growth and sprout flowers. My dog loved it too because she chewed open my bottle and ate the rest :/

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product worked really well. I had a plant in my backyard and it helped to shoot it right up. I would totally buy this again if I get back into gardening in the spring.

customer_reviews.title: Opened and spilt upon arrival!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say anything bad about the company, because the nutrients do work... but every time I order from Amazon THEY SHOW UP OPENED AND SPILT!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is great if your needing to give your plants something more I recommend this for sure! Easy to use doesn’t smell bad and does the job! You will get fuller blooms

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product it really made my plants come to life and started growing like mad! It's more than worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible smell lol, but hey it has bat guano in it (bat poop) my plants have never been greener until I started treating the soil with this formula 😉
customer_reviews.author: Isis Peters

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my jackfruit, lemon and avocado seeds grow. I have to believe it’s working really well by how far they’ve come. (I just planted the avocado seed) I used seeds from fruit I’ve purchased from Giant food stores.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Armistead

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to keep my plants alive over this harsh summer. Smells awful, but works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: MarNan

customer_reviews.title: Your plants will thank you.
customer_reviews.text: My plants love this stuff. I most use it on my indoor plants in the winter. They get so dry and lifeless because of the heat. This just brings them back to life. It’s very concentrated, so you only need a little bit diluted in water. Love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Kasandra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product to grow your plants quickly
customer_reviews.text: This stuff made my plants grow like no tomorrow!!! If i didn't have this product for my plants they probably would have died. They are charging an extremely fair amount for this product! And the price is even better! Not sure why its asking me about smell because its not supposed to smell good in the first place lol but its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other reviews, it came open with that little hole and broken seal. I bet these dudes buy in bulk and dilute the solution or if it is FoxFarm, their machine on the line sucks at gluing the seal. ill tell you a secret, support your local hydro store and buy it there.
customer_reviews.author: WooSuh

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this, my flowers and plants are loving it and growing beautifully! The smell is awful but hey, its fertilizer.

customer_reviews.title: Nutrients for my outdoor garden!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my garden outside and I can tell my plants really enjoy it. Gives them the nutrients they were lacking. I mix some in a bucket with water and water my plants with it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Big buds, low cost!
customer_reviews.text: The name says it all, low priced organic fertilizer that produces! Just ordered another bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Growth

product_meta.title: Fox Farm Big Bloom Liquid Concentrate Fertilizer, 1-Pint
product_meta.description: Size:1 pint| Color:whiteBig Bloom is a Natural and Organic Blossom Builder. Our special, micro-brewed formula incorporates earthworm castings, bat guano and other high test organic ingredients that offer a full range of nutrients. Norwegian kelp improves nutrient uptake and increases yields. Rock phosphate helps transfer energy from one part of the plant to another, which means bigger buds and more fragrant flowers. Big Bloom is ideal for all flowering and fruiting plants and it's safe enough to use every time you water. You'll enjoy healthy, vigorous flowers and dramatically improved fruit and vegetable flavors. Best of all, Big Bloom will intensify flower fragrance and it will increase essential oil production, which means stronger flavors in herbs, fruits and vegetables. Use Big Bloom to extend your fruit and flowering season late into the year. And when a plant is struggling, a root drench of Big Bloom will help to perk things up.
feature_bullets: Special; micro-brewed formula incorporates earthworm castings; bat guano and other high test organic ingredients
Big Bloom will intensify flower fragrance; and it will increase essential oil production
Big Bloom is ideal for all flowering and fruiting plants
